channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-6983] Metric for unencoded size of cached blocks
item.description: We need to measure the amount of unencoded data in the block cache when data block encoding is enabled.
item.summary: Metric for unencoded size of cached blocks

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.

comments.comment:
mbautin requested code review of "[jira] HBASE-6983 [89-fb] Metric for unencoded size of cached blocks".
Reviewers: Kannan, Karthik, Liyin, aaiyer, mcorgan, JIRA

We need to measure the amount of unencoded data in the block cache when data block encoding is enabled.

TEST PLAN
Unit tests

REVISION DETAIL
https://reviews.facebook.net/D5979
